Posts.Content: alexandra1 wrote: My wife was diagnosed stage 3 breast cancer a yr ago. She just completed her last round of Herceptin. We just found out its in the brain and spinal fluid. We are now on 15 rounds of radiation. being followed by a combo of herceptin for the rest of her life and going on chemo not sure which one my short term memory is gone due to stress. I need positive stories to show my wife to get her mentaly and emotionaly strong for this fight. She is still week from the last battle which was followed up with complications in december with Afrenal Gland failure. I need survivor stories. Thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I need hope !!!!! alexandra1 LuAnnH
